Text:
What a brilliant post. I never expected to see this posted as a full DVD.  Thank-you.

Here's info and screenshots for those who don't know of this movie http://www.spiritofbaraka.com/chronos.aspx

Sounds great. Do you have Baraka also?
Thanks

Great post !!
BTW, is the sound on this DVD in DTS 96/24 ? The best surround format, definitely.

Please, Seed it eternally !

Rather awfull video quality 3/10.
If you don't need a DVD format go for this mkv torrent:
